messages.message:
In Chatbot, when i type a question, and then press the arrow up, the previous asked queston will be added to my already typed question. this i can do endless and all questions will be added together.
Is this on purpose?

Expected behaviour, when I press up-arrow the current prompt will be replaced by the previous prompt.

https://docs.instabase.com/chat/converse#user-interface-tips
